location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Panorama from Kiln Post, Shaiba Shewing Ground Over which Arabs Attacked on the morning of 13th April 1915’

mods.abstract: Imprint:General Staff India. S.D.O. No. 1248, June, 1915.Distinctive Features:View of Shaiba battlefield and surrounding area issued as an ‘Appendix 12’ to illustrate enemy’s military operations on the 13th April 1915 with landmarks labelled for reference.Bottom right hand corner: ‘(Sd.) G.F.R. Wingate, Captain R. A., Shaiba 20-4-1915’.Marked ‘For Official Use Only’.
